txt_en: I will always think of you.
Take charge of your own life.
I shall turn out to be the hero of my own life.
People living deeply have no fear of death.
You can't compare yourself to other people. You'll do it your way.
txt_cn: 不必和他人比较，你有自己的人生节奏。
遇见对的人，从此便不再漂泊无依。

txt_en: I love you for who you are, not who the world wants you to be.
txt_cn: 我爱你，只因为是你，与世界对你的期待无关。

txt_en: The greatest thing you'll ever learn is to love.
txt_cn: 学会去爱，是人生最有意义的事情。

txt_en: We are soulmates tied together by the beautiful threads of fate.
txt_cn: 我们是命中注定的灵魂伴侣。

txt_en: We all have to deal with mountains.
txt_cn: 每个人都有自己需要越过的高山。
